name: How to Raise your Dragon
description:
"How to Raise your Dragon" was made for the Extra Credits' 2020 game jam, where the theme was 'Take care'. 

A game by David Kelly, with design & support by Katie Gardner.

Your objective is to take care of your dragon. You do this by keeping close by, feeding them and playing with them(playing not implemented).

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Left Stick - Move
Mouse move or Right Stick - Look
Shift or Left Stick down - Sprint
E or 'A'/south button - Interact
Esc or Menu button - Menu

Gather resources such as wood, stone, etc. to build useful structures, which can be done by interacting with signs
Interact with animals to gather meat

Assets Used:
Dragon Asset - "Low Poly Character - Dragons" by Infinity PBR
Low Poly Terrain generator - "Polaris V2" by Pinwheel Studio 
Low Poly Animals - "Low Poly Animals" by Polyperfect
All other Low Poly(Characters, enviroment, objects, etc.) - Various POLYGON packs by Synty Studios
Audio - "Fantasy Game" by Epic Sounds and FX
UI - "Simple Fantasy UI" by Unruly Games
